name: Cavern (GB Jam 8)
description:
Short Metroidvania style game for GB Jam 8! Made with ZGB and provided as a ROM for an actual Game Boy emulator of your choice (primarily tested with BGB, let me know if you have emu specific issues).

Still very much a work in progress, but there are a handful of rooms to explore, a couple of enemies to encounter, and some upgrades to find! But don't be surprised if a lot of things seem or feel incomplete!

Hopefully I'll get around to improving it with more to explore, better sprites and sounds, and maybe actually some music. For now, this is what I can get done for the jam. 

Enjoy!

+Controls+

D-Pad: Movement

A: Jump

B: Attack

+Upgrades+

Sword: Allows you to attack

Lamp: Lights up dark rooms

Boots: Allows you to dash (Hold B for a moment, then release)
